text: Black Rain is a 1989 American-Japanese crime action movie. It stars Andy Garcia, Michael Douglas and Ken Takakura. It was released in September 1989. The movie is about the Japanese underworld of crime with American crimes mixed in. == Other websites == * Category:1989 action movies Category:1989 crime movies Category:1989 thriller movies Category:1980s crime thriller movies Category:American action movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Gangster movies Category:Japanese action movies Category:Japanese crime movies Category:Japanese thriller movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Japan Category:Movies directed by Ridley Scott Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: Black Rain
